title: Gentleman Gnar Where?!
body: Where is he Riot? Tonight, is my last night to play league before I  goes on a lengthy study abroad trip in new zealand. I've been waiting weeks for the gentleman gnar and I'm worried I won't get to play him once before I have to go. Rito pls! When will you release him?

replies.body: He'll be out later this patch (5.13).
Any idea on when later will be? I too have been waiting for a while to play Gentleman Gnar. It's killing me not knowing when he will come out XD
We don't announce release dates in advance, aside from the patch they're in. Sorry. D:
Next week Thursday? Alright, I'll wait.
just like taric right ? *sobs uncontrollably* he will always be in the doom pit and now with tahm kench simply obsolete.
